product_description: The 1,700 MAX PSI* Electric Cold Water Pressure Washer is compact for storage, but powerful enough for your outdoor cleaning tasks. With a soap applicator and two nozzles, including a turbo nozzle, you have the accessories you need to wash your car or clean your back patio. The pressure washer wand contains a comfort grip that is designed for ease of use.

name: Electric Pressure Washer 5000 PSI 3.0 GPM High Power Washer with 4 Nozzles, 35FT Power Cord, Cleaning Machine with Foam Cannon for Cars Fences Driveways Patios Home Cleaning

Area Restrictions:The electric high pressure washer comes with 20FT pressure hose and 35FT power cord. you have the freedom to move it back and forth, making everyday cleaning a breeze.power pressure washer has a dual wheel design with an upgraded handle for comfort. Deep Cleaning:The electric pressure washer is equipped with a 350ml foam cannon that sprays foam onto the surface of the area being cleaned, allowing you to get the job done more efficiently.APPVAVA pressure washer is a high pressure washer designed specifically for cleaning jobs, so you don't have to worry about tough cleaning tasks. Security Systems and After-Sales: The electric power washer features with TSS (Total Stop System) and safety lock. The pump automatically shuts off when not triggered to save energy and prolong its life. The safety lock prevents the switch from being triggered incorrectly when not in use. We also offer 24/7 service, if you have any questions, please contact us

name: Electric Pressure Washer - 5000PSI Max 3.0GPM with 20FT Hose, 35FT Power Cord High Power Washers Electric Powered 4 Nozzles for Cleaning Patios, Cars, Gardens, Driveways and Outdoor Surfaces
short_description: Easy to Move and Use: The electric pressure washer features a 20 FT pressure hose and 35 FT power cord, providing excellent flexibility for cleaning around patios, gardens, cars, and more Professional Safety and Energy-Saving Design: Equipped with TSS, this high pressure washer automatically shuts down the motor when the trigger is released, preventing energy waste and extending the motor’s lifespan Superior Cleaning Power: With a powerful 1500-watt motor delivering up to 5000 PSI and 3.0 GPM, this pressure washer effortlessly blasts away stubborn dirt, grime, and stains. Perfect for tackling tough outdoor cleaning tasks, including walls, driveways, and gardens Versatile Nozzles and Soap Tank: The power washer customizes your cleaning with 4 interchangeable nozzles (0º, 15º, 25º, 40º) for different pressure settings, and use the included 450 ML foam cannon to create thick, rich foam for deeper, more effective surface cleaning Durable and Reliable Quality: This pressure washer features a rugged construction that resists wear and tear. If you have any questions or issues, our responsive customer service team is here to assist you with fast solutions for a hassle-free experience

name: Westinghouse ePX3100 Electric Pressure Washer, 2300 Max PSI 1.76 Max GPM with Anti-Tipping Technology, Onboard Soap Tank, Pro-Style Steel Wand, 5-Nozzle Set, for Cars/Fences/Driveways/Home/Patios
short_description: 2300 Max PSI (at initial discharge) of Deep-Cleaning Water Pressure and Up To 1.76 GPM (without nozzle at minimum pressure) Water Flow Pro-Style Steel Extendable 17.5 inch Wand with Quick-Connect Nozzles (0 Degree, 15 Degree, 25 Degree, Turbo, and Soap Applicator) Super Compact and Lightweight at 16.5” Tall and 19 lb. for Convenient Storage and Portability - Four Quick-Lock Wheels with 360 Degree Steering Design and Low Center of Gravity Engineered for Anti-Tipping Design Easy-Coil Nylon-Braided 25' hose - 20 oz (600 mL) Onboard Soap Tank to Add Detergents/Chemicals for Heavy-Duty Cleaning Power on Decks, Driveways, Garage Floors, Stairs, Fencing, Patio Furniture, and Vehicles Pump Automatically Stops when Trigger is Not Engaged to Conserve Energy and Promote Pump and Motor Life Backed by 3-Year Limited Service, Labor, and Parts Coverage with Nationwide Customer Service and Support Network
product_description: Tackle the toughest grime with the Westinghouse ePX3100 Electric Pressure Washer designed for your most easy and convenient cleaning experience yet. Delivering 2300 max PSI of pressure (at initial discharge) with up to 1.76 GPM of water flow (without nozzle at minimum pressure), this electric pressure washer has the muscle to scrub away mildew, grease, oil, tar, mud, rust, and more for all household surfaces with pure scouring force. Engineered to be perfectly balanced with a low center of gravity at 16.5 in. tall, it utilizes anti-tipping technology with four-wheel steering to dramatically increase comfort of use and maneuverability. With 360° turns, it’ll follow you wherever you go in one smooth motion from driveway to grass to maximize the efficiency of your cleaning tasks. Constructed into a super compact package, tuck it away and pull it out of storage with ease. This electric pressure washer features a pro-style gun with five Quick Connect spray tips, onboard detergent tank, and a flexible 25 ft. easy-coil hose for versatility at your fingertips. Backed by a Total Stop System (TSS) to conserve energy and prolong pump life, the ePX3100 Electric Pressure Washer will keep you blasting away dirt with half the size and all the power.

name: Kärcher Pressure Washer K1700, CETA Certified, 3 Spray Nozzles, Detergent Tank, for Cars, Driveways, Siding, Patios, 1.2 max. GPM
short_description: Powerful & CETA Certified: 1700 PSI TruPressure and 1.2 GPM for effective cleaning of various surfaces. Independently tested and CETA certified for proven performance you can trust. Versatile Cleaning Options: Equipped with three different nozzles (15°, turbo, and 65°), the K1700 allows you to tackle a wide range of cleaning jobs with precision User-Friendly Operation: An on/off foot switch provides back-friendly operation, and the unit automatically stops when the trigger is released. A 0.5 gal detergent tank makes cleaning even easier Effortless Maneuverability: Featuring never-flat wheels, the K1700 can be easily transported across various terrains for convenient use around your property The Kärcher Promise - Cleaner. Quicker: The K1700 power washer is perfect for cleaning pavement, patios, decks, cars, homes, fencing, and much more
product_description: The Kärcher K1700 is a versatile electric pressure washer ideal for all-around cleaning. With a 1700 PSI CETA™ certified TruPressure™ output and a GPM of 1.2, this power washer is easy to use for any homeowner and offers convenient features for efficient cleaning. The kit includes three different spray nozzles with a universal quick-connect fitting: a 15° nozzle for regular cleaning tasks, a turbo nozzle for intense cleaning power, and a 65° soap nozzle for applying detergent and achieving a sparkling finish. The integrated detergent tank on the top of the unit makes it easy to apply your favorite pressure washer detergents. For added convenience, the detergent tank is removable to fill and clean when needed. Thanks to the three different nozzles, the K1700 can be used to clean cars, patios, fencing, decks, and much more. The integrated storage container on the back of the unit keeps the trigger gun, hose, and spray wand securely stored away while not in use, ensuring everything stays organized. The nozzles can be secured on the handle when not in use, so you never misplace one ever again. Keep the power cord neatly organized using the cord wrap on the handle, where you can also store the power plug. The portable power washer features never-flat tires, so you can transport and use the unit anywhere on your property. No tools are needed for the assembly of the K1700, so you can start cleaning as soon as it arrives. The on/off foot switch provides easy power control, allowing you to turn the pressure washer on and off with a simple tap of your foot. Water flow is controlled separately through the trigger gun. This set includes the K1700, a pressure washer gun, a spray wand, a 15° nozzle, a 65° nozzle, a turbo nozzle, an adapter for 3/4" garden hose, a removable detergent tank, and a M22 18 ft. pressure washer hose.

name: Westinghouse WPX3200e Electric Pressure Washer, 3200 PSI and 1.76 Max GPM, Induction Motor, Onboard Soap Tank, Spray Gun and Wand, 5 Nozzle Set, for Cars/Fences/Driveways/Homes/Patios/Furniture, Blue
short_description: 3200 PSI and 1.76 GPM of Powerful, Deep-Cleaning Water Pressure Perfect for Decks, Sidewalks, Siding, Fences, Railings, Garage Floors, Exterior Walls, Cars and Patio Furniture – Easy to Fill 0.9 Gallon Gas Tank Half Gallon Onboard Soap Tank With 25 Foot Abrasion Resistant Super-Flex Hose With Lightweight Spray Gun and 5 Quick Connect Nozzles (0°, 15°, 25°, Turbo, & Soap) High Performance 13A Induction Motor with 35 ft. Power Cord - Long Lasting, Maintenance-Free Axial Cam Pump For Durable and Convenient Use Tough Steel Frame Construction With High Profile, Never-Flat Wheels Provide Easy Transportation and Maneuverability – Includes Tools and Quick Start Guide to Get Started in Minutes Backed by 3-Year Limited Manufacturer Service, Labor, and Parts Coverage with Nationwide Customer Service and Support Network
product_description: The Westinghouse WPX3200e 3200 PSI 1.76 GPM Electric Pressure Washer has the muscle to blast away grime from even your toughest cleaning jobs. Built with a high-performance induction motor, it's meant for powerful heavy-duty cleaning. From a wide variety of 5 nozzle tips, you can interchange the heads to suit your specific challenge of the day. Constructed with a handy 1.6 L soap tank on its side, the WPX3200e is safe to use on brick, stone, concrete, wood, aluminum, and iron. With never-flat wheels that offer easy roll-away mobility, you can easily maneuver the pressure washer to get into hard to reach corners and scale across walls. Deep cleaning projects such as decks, sidewalks, siding, fences, railings, garage floors, exterior walls, cars, and patio furniture are easier than ever before.

This tool delivers the versatility to clean tools and equipment, along with decks, siding, sidewalks, boats, outdoor furniture, and vehicles. The Corded Cold Water Pressure Washer can easily be transported to the jobsite or around the home with multiple grab points for loading and unloading, wheels.

name: Electric Pressure Washer, 2.5 GPM Power Washer with 4 Quick Connect Nozzles, High Pressure Cleaning Machine with Foam Cannon for Cars/Fences/Driveways/Patios/Home Cleaning (Green)
short_description: 【POWERFUL CLEANING】The Electric Pressure Washer has a deep cleaning water pressure up to 2.5 GPM of water flow. While saving water and energy, it also ensures high cleaning efficiency and the ability to clean objects with complex shapes and structures, which makes it ideal for cleaning various surfaces in the home, such as driveways, patio furniture, and cars. 【MULTI-FUNCTIONAL USE】The Power Washer is equipped with four quick-connect metal spray nozzles (water-pressure strength：0°＞15°＞ 25°＞ 40°) and a foam cannon. 4 metal nozzles with different pressure strengths for different application scenarios to meet your cleaning needs. The detergent bottle can be filled with chemicals such as bleach, the cleaner will not pass through the pump, so you don't have to worry about cleaning the machine. 【EASY TO USE】Equipped with a 20 FT hose and 16 FT power cord, The Pressure Washers provides ample length to ensure freedom of movement. The design of two rollers breaks through the environmental limitations for easy movement and operation, while the bottom of the body adds an anti-tipping design for overall stability when not in motion. In addition, it can take water from both a faucet and a bucket, making it easy to create a clean space wherever you want. 【CONVENIENT STORAGE】The High Pressure Cleaning Machines are equipped with a power cord hook and nozzle holder for easy access. In addition, its compact design makes it easy to store in a garage or pantry when not in use. The high pressure washer is perfect for cleaning concrete, pavement, driveways, patios, decks, sidewalks, RVs, cars, boats, homes, fencing, and more. 【SAVING WATER & SAFETY】The Electric Pressure Washer using high-pressure water flow to clean up the dirt, is currently recognized as the world's most scientific, economical and environmentally friendly cleaning methods. While saving water and energy, it also ensures high cleaning efficiency.

name: Electric Pressure Washer, Power 5000 Max PSI, 3.6 GPM Power Washer Machine with Hose Reel,4 Quick Connect Nozzles, Foam Cannon, for Cars, Patios, and Floor Cleaning, Tangerine
short_description: 【5000 Max PSI Pressure】Featuring incredible 1800W power, the power pressure washer utilizes a low energy consumption and high-efficiency copper core motor that provides a pressure of up to 5000 PSI. Higher and stronger pressure maks this water pressure machine to be a good ideal for use on your house, driveway, patio furniture, car, painted surfaces, and more. 【Safety Design】Our electric power washer is designed with safety in mind. It features a copper-core motor with overheating protection to prevent electric shock. The Total Stop System and safety lock ensure safe operation and prevent accidental triggering by children. Additionally, a power cord with a GFCI plug is included to prevent electricity leaks. 【Multiple Nozzles & Foam Cannon】The power power washer is equipped with four quick-connect metal spray nozzles (0°, 15°, 25°, 40°) and a foam cannon, making it versatile for cleaning everything from gaps in sidewalks or driveways to large areas like car windows. The foam cannon can be used with detergent to produce rich foams for a stronger cleaning effect when washing your car. 【Fantastic Storage】The high-pressure washer comes equipped with a sturdy hose reel, spray rack, power cord hook, foam cannon holder, and nozzle holder - all centrally stored for easy access. The hook-and-loop fastening strap ensures that cords won't become entangled. Plus, its compact design makes it easy to store in a garage or storage room when not in use. 【Easy to Use】The electric pressure washer breaks through environmental limitations with its 20ft hose and 35ft power cord, providing ample length for easier maneuvering. It can take water from both a water tap and bucket, making it convenient to create a clean space wherever you need it. Customers have rated this pressure washer highly for its versatility and ease of use.
